name: 書報討論－科技應用管理（四）
description:
	The objective of goals：
1.	To provide the latest professional knowledge in technological application management and enhance the level of research.
2.	To discuss the professional method of research and help students do research.

	Learning Materials:
We’ll offer given reading materials in the course.

	Grading:
1.	Paper Presentation:  50%
Every student should present papers in the semester.
2.	Class Participation:  50%
goals: 瞭解全球科技管理研究與理論之最新發展
syllabus: The course aims to help Management of Technology (MOT) major students understand the most up-to-date trends of MOT research through reviews and presentations of selected papers from an SSCI journal, Technological Forecasting and Social Change. Please refer to the web address of Dropbox being provided by the lecturer . Each student is required to present 3 papers, 1 from the text mining category, 1 from the big data analytics, and 1 from the patent mining category.  Each presentation should be last for 30 minutes. The Power Point slide should be submitted to Professor Huang one day before the lecture. A quiz may be accompanied with each course. The presentation slides should be written in English.

methodologies.note: 由修課同學參與論文討論

grading.note: 若無法出席，請於課前請假，否則每缺席一次扣總分5分
每一位學生必須報告選定論文
